name: Cassie's Cookbook!
description: Find, create and share all of your favourite recipes.
used: Node.js, Express.js to create a RESTful API. Handlebars.js as the templating engine. MySQL and Sequelize ORM for the database. GET and POST routes for retrieving and adding new data. Deployed with Heroku.

name: JavaScript Quiz!
used: HTML and CSS that are dynamically updated; powered by JavaScript

name: Employee Auditor
description: This application allows business owners to view and manage departments, roles and employees so that they can effectively organize and plan their business.

name: NoteTaker
description: This application allows the user to create a new note, save notes, open previous notes and delete notes.

name: README.md Generator
description: This is for users looking to quickly and easily create a quality README.md file by using a command-line application!
